application.name: lrowac2isis
application.brief: Import LRO WAC EDR images into Isis cube format

history.change: Updated to work with multiple summing modes in one image and added LUT capabilities.
Keywords are now being placed properly, moved all keyword calculations back to the TranslateLabels method.
Color offsets for BW mode images are now always zero. Color offset does not make sense for single band cubes.
Removed flip, changed default of coloroffset to off.
Now propogating new keyword from labels v1.1 bandwidth

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted LRO WAC EDR image file.
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the LRO WAC EDR image filename.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the base output filename.

parameter.name: COLOROFFSET
parameter.description: The result of how MARCI takes pictures leaves a filter height offset in adjacent filters. This will correct that offset by adding padding to the top of the image file, aligning color images correctly.

parameter.name: COLOROFFSETSIZE
parameter.brief: Amount of filter heights to pad with for COLOROFFSET
parameter.description: The filters are offset by a certain number of filters, which is a multiple of their height. It appears the filters are all offset by twice their height, or two filter heights. One filter height can be explained by the method of taking pictures: the first filter on the first framelet is one higher than the second filter on the first framelet.

parameter.name: UNLUT
parameter.brief: Use the lookup table in the labels
parameter.description: If this is set to true, and the input cube is lutted, a lookup table will be used to convert the raw DN values to their original values. This must be set to true for calibration.
